image 1920 1080
clear 180 180 255
color 255 255 255
spencil 50
line 100 100 1720 100
color 0 0 0
spencil 40
line 100 100 1720 100
color 255 255 0
spencil 1
line 100 100 1720 100
color 255 255 0
circle 1700 900 100
fill 1700 900
line 1700 900 1900 900
line 1700 900 1500 900
line 1700 900 1700 700
line 1700 900 1700 1100
line 1700 900 1850 750
line 1700 900 1550 750
line 1700 900 1850 1050
line 1700 900 1550 1050
spencil 3
color 150 255 150
rect 76 325 500 200
color 255 150 0
polygon 3 76 325 300 400 576 325
fill 100 327
spencil 1
curve 3 500 500 800 800 1500 500 
spencil 30
polygon3D 100 4 800 800 1000 800 1000 600 800 600]
color 255 0 0
line 300 300 600 600
save teste.ppm
